name: Shooting Champion VR
description:
A game which simulate the Olympic Games clay-pigeon shooting;
We have 20 levels,player have to pass current level to unlock the next level;
The last level is an infinite level.Game is over when player is ammo out.Every 5 combos will award 5 ammos
developers: 苏州光年数码科技有限公司
publishers: 苏州光年数码科技有限公司
